scripts.test: npm run mysql:start && npm run test:run && npm run mysql:stop
scripts.test:coverage: npm run mysql:start && npm run test:run:coverage && npm run mysql:stop
scripts.test:run: wait-on tcp:localhost:3307 && sleep 5 && mkdir -p test/report && npm run cucumber:exec && npm run test:finalize
scripts.test:run:coverage: wait-on tcp:localhost:3307 && sleep 5 && mkdir -p test/report && npm run cucumber:exec:coverage && npm run test:finalize
scripts.cucumber:exec: USE_ENV_VARIABLES=TRUE MYSQL_SQL_USERNAME=root MYSQL_SQL_PASSWORD=testpassword npx cucumber-js -f json:test/report/mysql.json --require "stepDefinitions/*.js" features/$FEATURE_FILE
scripts.cucumber:exec:coverage: USE_ENV_VARIABLES=TRUE MYSQL_SQL_USERNAME=root MYSQL_SQL_PASSWORD=testpassword npx nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --report-dir=../../coverage npx cucumber-js -f json:test/report/mysql.json --require "stepDefinitions/*.js" features/$FEATURE_FILE
scripts.mysql:start: docker-compose up -d && echo 'Waiting for MySQL to be ready...' && sleep 5
